question: What is an ILO?
answer: Initial Liquidity Offering occurs when buyers are offered a new token if they contribute to the liquidity of that pool.

question: Why ILO is important?
answer: We aim to make ClubRare a sustainable community-driven marketplace through a token economy designed with a long-term vesting structure, providing initial liquidity with funds raised from the community without private sales.

question: What kind of Token we use?
answer: Empower Token (MPWR) is ClubRare's utility token based on Ethereum Network. There are no private sales at all, and all allocations are strictly designed in a vesting structure.

question: ILO Conditions
answer:
To bootstrap MPWR token liquidity, an Initial Liquidity Offering (ILO) will be held before the official liquidity deployment on Uniswap.

  • 10,000 MPWR tokens (0.1% of total supply) , divided into 100 shares (100 MPWR per share) & 1 Lazy Leo Club NFT will be sold for 1 ETH.
  • Only Whitelisted wallet addresses could participate in the ILO.
  • Tokens sold at ILO are unlocked linearly per block in 360 days.

question: What happens after ILO?
answer:
After the ILO sale, 10,000 (0.1%) MPWR tokens + ETH raised will be deposited into Uniswap to bootstrap the initial liquidity.

If the 100 shares were not sold out during the ILO, the remaining shares were to be burned and MPWR tokens to bootstrap the initial liquidity were also to be reduced proportionally.

All LP tokens generated by bootstrapping liquidity were burned to 0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dead to lock the liquidity permanently.

question: WhiteList for ILO
answer:
• Only 400 Whitelisted user can participate in ILO
  • In the first hour of ILO, only Round 1 participants can participate, Round 2 participants after 1 hour, Round 3 participants after 2 hours, and Round 4 participants after 3 hours.
  • ILO Round 1 starts at May 5th, 2022 8AM (based on EST)

question: NFT Rewards
answer: Whitelisted addresses that joined the ILO are eligible to claim LazyLeoClub NFT (Floor price > 3 ETH in former pre-sales)

question: What is LazyLeoClub?
answer:
• The LazyLeoClub is a an NFT Membership Community with Limited Supply (A collection of 10,000 Membership NFT on Ethereum blockchain)
  • Limited Supply : LazyLeoClub starts with 100 Leos from the beginning.
  • LazyLeoClub Holder can get a special benefits from ClubRare and partners
